## AUTHENTICATION\_SERVICE\_OPTIONS variable

Authentication options token used for injecting into authentication service

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
AUTHENTICATION_SERVICE_OPTIONS: InjectionToken<AuthenticationServiceOptions<any>>
```
